title: How to Rotate Videos in iMovie

steps.headline: Select the video clip(s) you want to rotate
Click on the "'Adjust" button in the upper right-hand corner
Then, click on the third icon in the menu bar below the "Adjust" button
Click on these icons on the right side of the option box.
steps.description: The left rotate button turns the clip 90 degrees counter-clockwise and the right rotate button turns the clip 90 degrees clockwise.

steps.headline: Select the video clip(s) you want to rotate
Click on the crop icon in the middle toolbar
The rotation icons are located in the middle of the preview window.
steps.description: The left rotate button turns the clip 90 degrees counter-clockwise and the right rotate button turns the clip 90 degrees clockwise.

text: Using iMovie Version 10 Select the video clip(s) you want to rotate  Click on the "'Adjust" button in the upper right-hand corner  Then, click on the third icon in the menu bar below the "Adjust" button  Click on these icons on the right side of the option box. The left rotate button turns the clip 90 degrees counter-clockwise and the right rotate button turns the clip 90 degrees clockwise. Using iMovie '11 Select the video clip(s) you want to rotate  Click on the crop icon in the middle toolbar  The rotation icons are located in the middle of the preview window. The left rotate button turns the clip 90 degrees counter-clockwise and the right rotate button turns the clip 90 degrees clockwise.
sentences: Using iMovie Version 10 Select the video clip(s) you want to rotate  Click on the "'Adjust" button in the upper right-hand corner  Then, click on the third icon in the menu bar below the "Adjust" button  Click on these icons on the right side of the option box.
The left rotate button turns the clip 90 degrees counter-clockwise and the right rotate button turns the clip 90 degrees clockwise.
Using iMovie '11 Select the video clip(s) you want to rotate  Click on the crop icon in the middle toolbar  The rotation icons are located in the middle of the preview window.
The left rotate button turns the clip 90 degrees counter-clockwise and the right rotate button turns the clip 90 degrees clockwise.
